chatParticipants.name: johann
chatParticipants.description: Orchestration agent for GitHub Copilot. Decomposes tasks, selects models, spawns subagents, and manages long-running workflows.

commands.title: Johann: Disable Model Picker (Use Fixed Model)

johann.maxSubtasks.description: Maximum number of subtasks per orchestration plan.

johann.maxAttempts.description: Maximum attempts per subtask before giving up.

johann.allowParallel.description: Allow parallel execution of independent subtasks.

johann.useWorktrees.description: Use git worktrees to isolate parallel subtasks. Each parallel subtask gets its own working directory on a temporary branch, preventing file conflicts. Changes are merged back sequentially after execution. Requires git and a git repository. Falls back gracefully if unavailable.

johann.memoryDir.description: Memory directory relative to workspace root.

johann.maxBootstrapChars.description: Maximum characters for bootstrap context in system prompt.

johann.transcriptsEnabled.description: Record session transcripts as JSONL files.

johann.logLevel.description: Log level for the Johann output channel.

johann.autoDistill.description: Auto-distill daily notes into MEMORY.md during heartbeats.

johann.promptMode.description: System prompt assembly mode. Full = all sections, minimal = reduced for subagents, none = bare.

johann.largeInputChunkSize.description: Character count threshold for chunking large inputs. Inputs exceeding this size are processed in chunks to prevent information loss.

johann.maxInputSize.description: Maximum input size in characters. Inputs exceeding this are truncated with a warning.

johann.debugConversationLog.description: Write full LLM conversation logs to .vscode/johann/debug/ for debugging hangs and errors.

johann.modelPickerEnabled.description: Enable intelligent model picker. When disabled, Johann uses the fixed model specified in johann.fixedModel.

johann.fixedModel.description: Model to use when model picker is disabled. Use the model family name (e.g., 'gpt-4o', 'claude-3.5-sonnet'). Leave empty to use first available model.

johann.allowedModels.description: List of allowed model patterns (regex). Only models matching these patterns can be used. Empty array = all models allowed. Example: ['gpt-4o', 'sonnet', 'haiku'] to allow GPT-4o and Claude Sonnet/Haiku models.

johann.blockedModels.description: List of blocked model patterns (regex). Models matching these patterns will never be used. Takes precedence over allowedModels. Example: ['opus', 'o1-pro'] to block expensive models.

johann.backgroundModeEnabled.description: Enable background execution mode. When enabled, orchestrations run asynchronously without blocking the chat interface. Useful for long-running tasks.

johann.allowOpusEscalation.description: Allow escalation to expensive Opus models (3× or higher cost) when cheaper models fail. Default: false. Enable only if you explicitly want to use Opus models.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
